title: Naruto Shippuuden Movie 7: The Last
alternative_title: The Last: Naruto the Movie, THE LAST NARUTO THE MOVIE
description: The moon is beginning to fall, and at the rate it's going, it is doomed to fall on the Earth. The countdown for the survival of the planet begins. Among the havoc, Hinata's younger sister Hanabi is captured by the mysterious enemy, Toneri Ootsutsuki. Naruto must overcome great danger on a mission to save Hanabi and the world along with Hinata, Sai, Shikamaru, and Sakura is their final story. "The final story is a first love."
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
